description: Baroness Collins is the culminating drink for a&nbsp;hot summer day. This invigorating cocktail is made with Campari, an Italian liqueur known for its bitter, fruity flavor. Whether you're hosting a backyard barbecue or relaxing poolside, Baroness Collins will surely be your go-to cocktail for hot summer days
